definitions.structures.abstr.vectorspaces

Interface FunctionSpace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Group, Monoid, SemiGroup, Unweavable, VectorSpace, XmlPrintable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EuclideanFunctionSpace
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FiniteDimensionalFunctionSpace, FiniteDimensionalSobolevSpace, PolynomialFunctionSpace, TrigonometricSobolevSpace, TrigonometricSpace

    public interface FunctionSpace
extends VectorSpace, Unweavable
    Author:
    RoManski A function space knows what an integral is. It is defined on an interval and carries an small parameter eps due to approximative methods.

      • getIntegral

        default Scalar getIntegral(Function vec1,
                           Function vec2,
                           double left,
                           double right,
                           double eps)
        General static integral method for the product of two functions.
        Parameters:
        vec1 - first function.
        vec2 - second function.
        left - the interval is [left,right].
        right - the interval is [left,right].
        eps - the correctness parameter..
        Returns:
        the integral over vec1*vec2.
